Once again, I have completely forgotten about Shredder.

::Shredder::

Shredder stops in the air, looking back at the Destrons behind him. 
They were en-route to the new Destron base.

"You guys keeping up ok?" he asks.


(I'm off to bed now. Second day of hell, er .. I mean school is 
tomorrow.)
